transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan ji.
Executive: Sir main Akshay baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se account manager sir. Sir maine kal aapko phone kiya tha aapne aapne phone hi pick up nahi kiya.
Customer: Abhi main aapko na do minute ke andar wapas call kar raha hu sir washroom mein hai.
Executive: Main aapko kab tak call karu?
Customer: Haan main do minute ke andar wapas call kar raha hu sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive was following up on a previous call.
- Customer was unavailable to talk.


Resolution:

- Customer stated he was in the washroom.
- Customer promised to call back in two minutes.


Next Steps: 
Issue not resolved. Customer will call the executive back in two minutes.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral | Non-urgent

@@@Key Topics:
- callback, follow-up
